text: Oakshott is a hamlet in the East Hampshire district of Hampshire, England. It lies one mile (1. 6 km) south of the village of Hawkley and 2.5 miles (4 km) north of Petersfield. The nearest railway station is Petersfield, 2.5 miles (4 km) south of the hamlet. ==External links== * Category:Villages in Hampshire
title: Oakshott
